review: We have been very pleased with our Amazon Fire.  It combines all of our streaming services and is much more compact and requires less power than our previous Google TV.  Love that it is coordinated with Amazon and I can listen to my Amazon music library as often as I want.

review: This is awesome! We use it while camping!
author: Ty Beck

review: Its awesome. Albeit the commercials for this is pretty stupid, it does exactly as advertised...and it does it very well. We are in love with the AMAZON FireTv...and we've used AppleTV. So we know the difference. We really...REALLY like FireTV. Its the little nuances that make it special. Its just something you'll need to try to understand. But be forewarned...its addictive. ;-)Thanks Amazon.
author: Daron Babin

review: Great deal with the 50$ off with sling tv subscription. Faster and better than using my ps3. Did take me a few days to find all that it does, like history channel app
author: D Caulk

review: I had been undecided about this product for some time..After talking with a close friend who had purchased the Fire TV, I decided to go ahead and am happy that I made the decision.  This product was so easy to connect I could not believe it.  Even if you are technology challenged, you will have no difficulty with this item.  It works great & I love the variety of options it provides me.  If in doubt, buy it!
author: Somersales "Voracious reader"

review: Device works and arrived quickly. The only drawback, which I may have overlooked literature on and so was surprised by, is the fact that even though we have Prime, we still need to buy a fairly substantial number of the movies that are available.
